titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide services for birthmothers who are placing or have placed a child for adoption, and for other purposes.
Improving Adoption Outcomes and Affordability Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: Improving Adoption Outcomes and Affordability Act of 2019This bill requires that the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) provide post-adoption counseling services to birthmothers who place their children for adoption. HHS also must provide information for contacting counseling service providers and fund training for hospital staff about post-adoption care.
